name: Trials of Totec
description:
We are team Bee's, we are a group who are making a game for our course and would like your feedback. Currently the game is in ALPHA phase. The game is Trials of Totec, a light based puzzle game, where the Player has to use light to complete puzzles and restore colour to a colourless world. Hope you enjoy it.

Trials of Totec Found Bug & Suggestion form
